pages.text: When you go through medic stations in Battlefield Villages, you might come across a strange looking box that seems to host hazardous material. Well thankfully for you, these are completely harmless and are just for decoration.$(br2)They're not craft-able; you'll have to break these and carry em with you.
$(o)Looks deadly, but its not. In fact, its one of the nicer things you'll find in a Battlefield.
